Minor Requirements: Minimum 18 credits at the 200-level or above
Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the minor
Elective Requirement (12 credits): Complete 12 credits of English courses, including a minimum of 6 credits at the 300- or 400-level and a minimum of 3 courses in literature. With the approval of the minor advisor, one literature course from a department other than English may be counted for minor credit.
